author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
Sir Ian McKellen recently revealed that both Gandalf and Frodo will be returning for The Hunt for Gollum film.  We chat about how Elijah Wood may appear, where this fits in the timeline of the films, and what I'm looking for as we look ahead to the May 2026 filming start date!

The Hunt for Gollum is slated for release in December 2027.

For the Love of Fantasy Con site: https://www.fortheloveoffantasy.com/

#frodo #huntforgollum #gandalf
title: Frodo & Gandalf Returning for Hunt for Gollum! | Tolkien News
